body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Watson Autos. My name is John Watson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ann. Can you confirm your date of birth for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's the twenty-third of October, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Can I also have the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, they are seven two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ann, for providing the information. Is there anything specific you need assistance with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am feeling disappointed about the product quality at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Ann. We value your feedback and will address this concern promptly. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Ann. Have a great day.
